name: Altius (Day4me23)
description:
Combat your way through a consistently descending dungeon. Discover unique paths which may loop through previously explored areas and offer new items to equip. Can you make it to the end of the available dungeon?

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move Character

E - Interact

Tab - Inventory

Left Click - Light Attack

Right Click - Heavy Attack

Space - Roll/Dodge

Space(Hold) - Sprint

R - Use Consumable

CREDITS:

Dayne Farris - Level Design, Programming, Game Design

Derek Woodard - Player Input, Blend Trees, Programming 

Kian Frank - UI Art, Audio Implementation

Environmental Art Assets - Synty Studios Fantasy Dungeon Pack
